title: Ghost a - need help please.
content:
I had this red ghost “a” appear (see the red a in back). I don't know how that happen, I guess I've done a wrong command, but now I see it on each glyph window. Does someone can help me get rid of this ghost?

Many thanks!

André

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130311033049im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ghost_a_6676.png)
author: sim

comments.content:
\>Tools \>Mask \>Clear global mask.

You must have copied that a to the global mask accidentally.

Yep! Probably did that. Thanks Nick.

André
